data.title: Christopher Koch - Real Estate Agent in Your Area
data.meta_description: Find real estate agent & Realtor® Christopher Koch in your city on Realtor.com®, your source for top rated real estate professionals.
data.text: With over a decade of real estate experience in Philadelphia, CJ is able to provide the highest quality of services to both buyers and sellers of real estate. He knows the city inside and out. His neighborhoods of specialty are Roxborough, Manayunk, Queen Village and Bella Vista. CJ began his real estate career investing in properties that he renovated, designed, managed, and sold for top market value. He has made smart investment choices, and as a result, his real estate advice is highly sought after. CJ understands the real estate market from an investor's perspective, and therefore, is able to pass on this knowledge to his clients when making real estate decisions. Buyers seek out his market knowledge and knack for finding exceptional deals. Additionally, CJ knows what it takes to sell homes for top dollar in the market. Marketing beyond Trend/MLS is key and CJs extensive network of contacts is key to his success. He knows how to connect a home with the right buyer and to find buyers the right home. He currently has several new construction projects in development in Roxborough, Manayunk, and Center City. Give him a call to find out more about these or other upcoming projects early. CJ has been a lifelong Philadelphia resident and lives in the city with his wife, Jenn, and son, Anthony. He is a member of the National Association of Realtors and the Greater Philadelphia Association of Realtors.
